1232720.name: Ghosts 4 Everybody
1232720.description:
Gather up to three of your buddies and fight for gold and glory. Gear up in your armory to fight growing enemy armies.
Most Roguelikes either end or give you a break if you die. This game won't! Players can still support their friends after they have died.
But beware, dead enemies are also able to support their friends. The more enemies you kill, the harder this game gets.
Collect gold from fallen enemies and deliver their ghosts to the next shop to get new weapons, potions and upgrades.

Features:

  • Four player local coop-mode
  • Dead players become ghosts and can support their living friends
  • Dead enemies become ghosts and will support other enemies (including bosses)
  • Upgrade or buy new weapons in the shop for gold
  • Upgrade your hero by bringing enemy ghosts to the shop
  • Procedurally generated levels

Remote Play Together

Steam offers to play local games over the internet via Remote Play Together.
Just like playing locally only the host needs to own a version of the game.
Please be aware that you need a strong connection to stream the game to 3 additional players and only one player can use mouse and keyboard controls to play the game.
